mapper.insert: insert into t03_plat_achieve ( achieve_id, module_id, index_title, index_name, index_content, img_path, index_state, pub_state, order_by, cre_time, upd_time )values( #{achieve_id}, #{module_id}, #{index_title}, #{index_name}, #{index_content}, #{img_path}, #{index_state}, #{pub_state}, #{order_by}, now(), now() )
mapper.update: update t03_plat_achieve set index_state=1 ,pub_state=1 ,cre_time=now() ,upd_time=now() where achieve_id = #{achieve_id}
mapper.select:
select e.*,o.function_name from t03_plat_achieve e left join t01_function_info o on e.module_id = o.module_id
order by ${_sql_order}
select index_title,index_name,index_content as content,img_path as img_url from t03_plat_achieve where index_state=1 and pub_state=1 order by order_by
